subject: Football (College)
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: With 378 yards on the ground, the Orange manhandled the Mountaineers, 38-14, amid snow and sleet to earn their second bowl win in four years under Coach Doug Marrone.
snippet: With 378 yards on the ground, the Orange manhandled the Mountaineers, 38-14, amid snow and sleet to earn their second bowl win in four years under Coach Doug Marrone.
